lead_paragraph: The weak consumer mood has kept a lid on spending, as wages have yet to increase enough to make up for the sales tax increase, and the pace of inflation has slowed.

headline.main: Figures Show Continued Unevenness in Japan's Recovery
headline.print_headline: Figures Show Continued Unevenness in Japan's Recovery

snippet: The weak consumer mood has kept a lid on spending, as wages have yet to increase enough to make up for the sales tax increase, and the pace of inflation has slowed.
